name: Pit of the Wyrm
description:
This is for the November 2022 "Vampire the Masquerade" game jam.

Vampire: The Masquerade Jam 2022 - itch.io

This is essentially a very rough prototype - just a short scenario with the character running through two areas. The player is put into the role of a vampire from the warrior clan Brujah, who is trying to recover an occult treatise stolen from Morocco.

The content is a mix of custom art of my own (all the characters and some of the environment assets) and downloaded content from the UE marketplace for the rest of the environment assets.

Note: The download size is 1.36gb. I'm very new to using Unreal Engine to make games, so I wasn't sure how to reduce the file size any further. Probably a lot of lighting/texture stuff that I'll need to figure out how to optimize for future projects!
